tasks.title: Watch Shrek!
tasks.description: I need to watch movie shrek. Shrek is love, Shrek is life.

tasks.title: Buy little mermaid!
tasks.description: I need to go to the store, take my money out, put it on the counter and buy some nice little mermaid merchandise.

tasks.title: Steal a horse!
tasks.description: First I need a plan, I'll buy one on Amazon. Then I need some bitcoin to bribe the stable boy. Then I'll steal a horse and will be able to sing, look at my horse, my horse is amazing, give it a lick, it tastes just like raisins
